programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Carmine and Mike take on their largest project yet as they try to deliver high-end, contemporary style to actor Gabrielle Dennis' traditional home. Carmine tries to claim more of the budget while they work, but the backyard is in need of a major makeover.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Multiple issues with a renovation cause Carmine and Mike to pull from each other's budget. When they struggle to keep the project from going up in flames after finding an issue with the owner's fireplace, the guys must get creative to complete the job.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Carmine and Mike's skills are tested when big-ticket items take away from the budget for renovating a Spanish-style home in Leimert Park. The duo must get creative by restoring vintage pieces around the house to finish the project.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Budgets are tested while renovating a former bachelor pad for newlywed clients. Carmine and Mike balance costs to redesign the entire interior and create a dreamy backyard, but construction issues leave them pointing fingers at who will pay for repairs.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Carmine and Mike try balancing the budget for their newlywed clients who spent their honeymoon money on a fixer upper. Several issues place the project in jeopardy as they figure out whose part of the budget will pay for the problems.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Mike pitches his grandest idea ever to a client looking to convert their garage into a primary bedroom. When he and Carmine struggle to balance the budget on this unique extension, it's Mike who has to put in the sweat equity to keep his vision alive.

programme.title: Hot Mess House

programme.desc: Claire and Phil decide to spy on Luke and Manny as they're hanging out with one of their more questionable friends. Meanwhile, Gloria is furious with Jay because she thinks he had a dream about another woman.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is upset to have lost his elected office of social chair to his nemesis Gil Thorpe, and when he finds out Luke is competing against Gil's kid in a wrestling match, it becomes his own personal battle.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron is in charge of the school's spring dance, but when a popular teacher returns from sabbatical, a bit of not-so-friendly competition blooms. With Claire on chaperone duty at the dance, Phil gets Haley to accompany him to the realtor's banquet.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: It's male-bonding day when Jay takes Luke into the garage to show him the way around tools and impart some manly wisdom, and Gloria goes with Claire and Lily to shop for Lily's flower girl dress.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The adults are Vegas-bound when Jay hooks them up with Excelsior Level hotel accommodations courtesy of one of his big clients, but after learning there's an even higher level, Jay becomes obsessed with upgrading.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch struggles to hide his true feelings about the unflattering wedding topper Cam's father whittled out of soap for them. Phil tries to help Gloria sell her pre-Jay apartment, but they get sidetracked at the neighbourhood salon.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The entire family tags along as Phil fulfills his mom's wish for him to return to his roots and visit the country where he was conceived: Australia. Unfortunately, Phil's attempts to embrace his native land are met by a lot of rejection.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil fails at his task to stay home and wait for the repairman, forcing him to tell an elaborate lie to hide the truth from Claire, but the stress is more than he can physically handle. Meanwhile, Gloria is responsible for organizing the family portrait.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay, Gloria and Manny challenge each other to step outside their comfort zone and try something new. Mitch and Cam's wedding is getting too big and costly, so they resort to selling a couple of their prized possessions.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam’s big day is finally here and nothing can ruin it, until nothing turns into a whole lot of somethings and puts wedding planner extraordinaire Pepper Saltzman to the test. Jay and Gloria host the Tuckers. Phil squeezes in an eye procedure.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The wedding day chaos continues as the entire party shifts from one contingency plan to another. Guests start to get testy, Mitchell and Cameron are feeling discouraged and poor Claire shows physical wear and tear.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: This summer has been exceptionally blissful in the Dunphy house. Alex is away on a humanitarian trip and the rest of the family is getting along swimmingly, but when Alex comes home, there is an immediate shift in mood.

programme.title: We Got Love Teyana and Iman
programme.desc: Power couple, Teyana Taylor and Iman Shumpert, face big transitions in their lives. With Teyana’s recent retirement from music and Iman’s NBA career on hold, they turn their attention to their daughter, Junie, who has ambitions of her own.

programme.title: Nightly Pop
programme.desc: A topical pop culture talk show.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: When Carrie tells Aidan she wants to take things slower, he refuses to give her time and moves out of their apartment the following day. Meanwhile, the monogamy bug bites Samantha when she finds out Richard is sleeping with other women.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie has a serious financial problem; Miranda and Steve grapple with raising a baby.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie begins her new job at Vogue; Charlotte hosts Miranda's baby shower.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie becomes nostalgic about her relationship with Mr. Big and the city she loves.

programme.desc: The girls try to come to terms with Miranda's new life with Brady; Carrie meets a sailor.

programme.desc: Samantha gets back together with Richard; Carrie has a dry spell in her love life.

programme.desc: The girls head to Atlantic City for a 'girls' weekend; Samantha can't trust Richard.

programme.title: Sex and the City

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim's confidence is still shaken up from the Mexico trip. Khloe wants mother-daughter bonding time and isn't impressed when Kris has no time for it. Kourtney is keeping her dating life on the down low.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kourtney plans a fun sister getaway to bond with Kendall, but is distracted by news of Scott's destructive behavior at home. Later, Kim stages an unwelcome intervention on Khloé's wardrobe.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Scott threatens to ruin Kourtney's trip to Cannes. Kim struggles to set clear boundaries with her assistant and the girls get educated about Planned Parenthood.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Khloe fears that Cleveland fans may turn on her family. Kim gets fed up with her lack of willpower and makes a drastic lifestyle.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim is shocked to learn about the rising rate of homelessness in LA and sets out to bring awareness to the growing crisis. Meanwhile Kris hires a scribe to document her every word.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Khloé and Kendall consider getting guns for protection, Kris imposes strict guidelines for her mom to follow in her new condo, and later Kim can't handle her new rambunctious puppy.

programme.title: The Daily Pop
programme.desc: Zooey Deschanel spills dating secrets and Jason Sudeikis stops by to talk 'Ted Lasso' and more.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: It's Jay and Gloria's anniversary and they can't seem to get on the same page on what kind of gift to give; sentimental or expensive. And, the Dunphys head to Caltech for Alex's college tour.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is putting together Mitch and Cam's wedding video for a special family screening, but when the footage reveals that he is responsible for a horrible cold that has plagued the family, he must do some creative editing.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Dunphys move into a cramped hotel room while their house is getting treated for mold, which Phil sees as an opportunity to spend some quality time together, but Claire and the kids are less than enthused.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is selling the house next door and he and Claire are excited by the prospect of having wonderful new neighbours, but that quickly turns into panic when a loud and obnoxious couple come to look at the house.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Even though Halloween is Claire's holiday, she allows Phil to take over this year so instead of her usual fright-fest theme, he decides to turn the house into AwesomeLand.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire don't know if they should be happy or concerned that Haley and Andy are spending a lot of time together, however, they soon find things are not what they appear.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is cooking Thanksgiving dinner this year with Luke as his sous chef, but Claire has no confidence in them and prepares a secret turkey of her own as backup.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When Alex tells Phil and Claire she has a boyfriend, they worry they’ve put too much pressure on her and has made up an imaginary boyfriend.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley's turning 21 and the family is taking her to a bar to celebrate. Claire really wants Haley to start seeing her as a friend rather than her uptight mom, and Mitch and Cam make the sad realization that they may not be as cool as they thought.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: While driving out to get breakfast, the Dunphys including Manny have a near death experience causing everyone to reevaluate their lives.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire is furious about neighbours Ronnie and Amber's eye-sore of a boat on their front lawn and it soon becomes an all-out war when Phil calls in the 'big guns' as back up.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is starting to feel the teenage cold shoulder from Luke, and with Andy hanging around a lot recently as his apprentice, he easily steps in as his new right hand man.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: After college co-ed Jessica O'Grady vanishes late one night after leaving to see her boyfriend, locals are left to wonder if she was kidnapped.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin was born as an elderly man. As he grows up he gets younger which is hard on the people around him. He meets a woman while he is in his forties but he gets younger as she ages.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: A woman who works as an elf at a year-round Christmas store meets a man and finds her life changing.

programme.title: A Hidden Life
programme.desc: A Catholic farmer refuses to fight for the Nazis.

programme.title: Desperately Seeking Susan
programme.desc: A bored housewife loses her memory and mistakenly believes herself to be a woman from the personal ads whom she was seeking. Her new persona has her dodging several shady characters through the streets of New York City.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple agrees to have a doctor clone their recently deceased eight year-old son. Everything seems fine until their new son reaches the age at which he previously died, and strange things begin to occur.

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: A schoolteacher, dreaming of a Hawaiian vacation, is assigned to teach summer school.

programme.title: View From the Top
programme.desc: A small-town woman attempts to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

programme.title: Stand and Deliver
programme.desc: A tough teacher inspires his East L.A. students to go on to greater achievements.

programme.title: A Better Life
programme.desc: A gardener struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents all while trying to give the boy opportunities he never had.

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: Mischievous teenagers hack into a corporate network and stumble upon evidence of a crime.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Amidst escalating violence in New York, a young man seeks to avenge his father's murder and restore peace to the area.

programme.title: He Said, She Said
programme.desc: Two reporters fall in love despite the fact that they never seem to agree about anything.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: The gang returns to Michigan for their 10 year high school reunion.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: An awkward Catholic schoolgirl dreams of being a star in order to kiss her dream boy.

programme.title: The Chosen
programme.desc: Two young Jewish boys in 1940's Brooklyn find a common bond through stickball.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: A naive college student meets a wealthy businessman whose sexual practices strain their relationship.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: While on a mission to learn what happened to her mother, a woman performs unauthorized in exorcisms.

programme.title: Q
programme.desc: A man discovers a flying serpent's nest atop a high rise and uses it to his advantage.

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Richard Cooper, a bored family man, considers having an affair with an old friend but doesn't want to jeopardize his marriage.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: An astronaut returns to earth after an impactful mission, and struggles to reintegrate.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A police negotiator must call on his skills when his own family is taken hostage.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: A British upper class family seeks suitable mates for their five daughters.

programme.title: Lucky Numbers
programme.desc: A bankrupt weatherman teams up with several people in a scheme to defraud the lottery.

programme.title: The Banger Sisters
programme.desc: Two former groupies reconnect after 20 years, despite their different paths through life. They soon come to realize that they represent two extremes, conventionalism and liberation, and that they need each other to lead happier lives.

programme.title: The Girl With All the Gifts
programme.desc: In the future, humanity is ravaged by a fungal disease that turns humans to zombies. After their base is attacked, a teacher escapes with an infected child being studied. Along with a scientist, they must traverse the dangerous country to safety.

programme.title: Body Brokers
programme.desc: After travelling to Los Angeles to get treatment for his drug addiction, a man discovers there is more to his rehab facility than meets the eye. Soon enough, he's on the road to uncovering a billion-dollar cover up tied to the recovery industry.

programme.title: The Good Liar
programme.desc: A conman targets a wealthy widow, but his scam turns into a game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me
programme.desc: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil when her struggling brother returns to town.

programme.title: Above the Rim
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball player is torn between his coach and a local gangster.

programme.title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
programme.desc: A six-year-old girl leaves her hometown to search for her mother after her father's health crisis releases fictional creatures into the wild.

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: A surfer girl falls for a football player while preparing for an important competition.

programme.title: Lola Versus
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman dumped by her fiancé just three weeks before their wedding embarks on a series of adventures to help her come to terms with approaching 30 as a single woman.

programme.title: Killer Klowns From Outer Space
programme.desc: Aliens who look like circus clowns terrorize a small town, abducting and killing the townspeople.

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A detective goes undercover at a private school to bust a car theft ring.

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: While following their dreams of stardom in Hollywood, a couple meets on the Sunset Strip.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

programme.desc: When a CIA agent is kidnapped, a team of elite Navy SEALS set out on a mission to recover the agent.

programme.desc: In an attempt to capture ruthless cop killers, an NYPD detective shuts down the city's bridges.

programme.desc: Stunning archival footage and contemporary interviews help take a closer look at comedian Dick Gregory's legacy. Documenting his personal reinventions, while also hearing from entertainers who have been inspired by his blueprint.
